item.description:
The Boston University Creative Writing Program's Annual Faculty Reading



Robert Pinsky, Louise Glück, Leslie Epstein, David Ferry, Allegra Goodman, Ha Jin, Melinda Lopez, Rosanna Warren, and William Delman



Tuesday, February 9, at 7:30 pm

Boston University 's School of Management Auditorium

595 Commonwealth Ave., Boston



Former US Poets Laureate Robert Pinsky and Louise Glück will be among the distinguished authors participating in Boston University 's Annual Faculty Reading on February 9th, 2010. Sponsored by BU's Creative Writing Program, one of the oldest in the country, the event will begin at 7:30 p.m. at the Boston University School of Management Auditorium. Other notable faculty members will include: Leslie Epstein, Director of the Program; poet and translator David Ferry; Allegra Goodman, bestselling novelist and finalist for the National Book Award; Ha Jin, National Book Award and two-time PEN/Faulkner winner, and alum of the Creative Writing Program; playwright Melinda Lopez; poet Rosanna Warren; and William Delman, a recent graduate of the Creative Writing Program in poetry.



Free and open to the public



For more information, 617-353-2510 or http://www.bu.edu/wri...
